name: PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent
description: The PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent interface of the Presentation API is fired on a PresentationRequest when a connection associated with the object is created.

parameters.name: PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent.connection Read only
parameters.description: Returns a references to the PresentationConnection object that fired the event.

members.name: PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent.connection
members.description: Returns a references to the PresentationConnection object that fired the event.
